mapper.sql: id, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, name, address, post, phone, userId
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO shop_user_area ( creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, name, address, post, phone, userId ) VALUES ( #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{status}, #{name}, #{address}, #{post}, #{phone}, #{userId} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE shop_user_area
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
status = #{status},
name = #{name},
address = #{address},
post = #{post},
phone = #{phone},
userId = #{userId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE shop_user_area
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
name = #{map.name},
address = #{map.address},
post = #{map.post},
phone = #{map.phone},
userId = #{map.userId},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_user_area ( creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, name, address, post, phone, userId ) VALUES ( #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.name}, #{map.address}, #{map.post}, #{map.phone}, #{map.userId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM shop_user_area
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{name} , '%')
AND address like CONCAT('%', #{address} , '%')
AND post like CONCAT('%', #{post} , '%')
AND phone like CONCAT('%', #{phone} , '%')
AND userId like CONCAT('%', #{userId} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
